About

With over six years of dedicated experience, I have honed my expertise in designing, developing, and deploying robust data solutions. My journey began with software engineering, building a strong foundation that naturally evolved into a passion for data automation and large-scale pipeline architecture.

My core focus is on the Azure cloud platform, where I leverage services like Azure Data Factory, Azure DevOps, and Power BI to transform complex data challenges into streamlined, automated processes. I thrive on leading cross-functional teams to deliver projects that not only meet but exceed expectations, ensuring data integrity, scalability, and performance.

Experience

July 2022 – Aug 2024

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation · Eurofins IT

  • Architected and implemented a scalable ETL data pipeline for 38 Azure tenants, centralizing data for compliance reporting using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI.
  • As Scrum Master, led a team of 6 engineers in a multi-national SharePoint data migration, delivering the project ahead of schedule by implementing best practices for validation and monitoring.
  • Automated data entry for 146 office locations by developing a PowerApps app integrated with SQL Stored Procedures, significantly reducing manual input and boosting data consistency.
  • Engineered a pipeline to migrate 6TB of unstructured data from on-prem SharePoint to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online, ensuring seamless data flow and scalability.
  • Built data ingestion and processing pipelines for M365 activity logs, decreasing audit time by 70% and improving data governance through automated validation and transformation.
June 2018 – June 2022

Software Engineer · Eurofins IT

  • Created and deployed scheduled jobs using Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from a distributed system (18 servers) into a unified database for analysis by the data team.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days and providing real-time cost analysis and reporting via Power BI.
  • Built a C# web application to automate loading and managing 1600 dynamic email distribution lists, making them accessible to over 60,000 users via a SharePoint interface.

Projects

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based sentiment analysis pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

Python PySpark BeautifulSoup PostgreSQL Streamlit

FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor

Developed a regression model in R leveraging player performance, physical attributes, and career stats to forecast the market value of professional football strikers, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.

R Regression Data Modeling Statistics
